newsitem.title: USA: TWA to add flights for spring.
newsitem.headline: TWA to add flights for spring.

text.p: Trans World Airlines Inc said Wednesday it will add flights to 19 North American destinations in advance of the spring travel season.

As of February 15, the carrier will increase the number of average daily departures from its St. Louis hub to 346, while flights at its New York hub at Kennedy International Airport will rise to 38 average daily departures, TWA said.
TWA is the nation's seventh-largest carrier, offering 784 average daily flights to 79 North American and 11 international destinations.
Its shares were unchanged Wednesday at six.
